title: Pixel 4 features that don't seem to be available in the UK
content:
Just a list of things I've discovered so far for those of you contemplating an upgrade but wondering which features won't be available to you.

Car crash detection - "Car crash detection is available in the United States and in English only" (see "Turn on car crash detection" section on linked page)
Google One Pro sessions - US and Canada only (see screenshot at base of post taken from Pixel tips app on the phone). 
Call Screening - "You can screen calls in English, in the United States and Canada, on all Pixel phones and on some other Android phones." (reference). I think this arrived with the Pixel 3, so a bit concerning that it's still not available in the UK. Does the feature need some sort of carrier integration which might explain the absence?
